doc:
Pamela Baird https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Pamela_Baird 0 Pamela Baird (born Pamela Beaird on April 6, 1945) is an American former actress, best known for her role as "Mary Ellen Rogers", the girlfriend of "Wally Cleaver" on the classic sitcom, Leave It to Beaver. She appeared in seven of the show's 235 episodes, but her name was mentioned in many other segments. Mary Ellen and Wally eventually wed, as they were shown as a married couple in the 1983 reunion movie Still the Beaver and the subsequent The New Leave It to Beaver series (in which Janice Kent played Mary Ellen). Prior to Leave It to Beaver, Baird appeared as Hildy Broeberg in ten episodes of the CBS western series My Friend Flicka (1956–1957), starring Johnny Washbrook, Gene Evans, Anita Louise, and Frank Ferguson. Baird also appeared as one of Kelly's {Noreen Corcoran} friends on the sitcom Bachelor Father. She is now married, has five children, and is legally named Pamela Beaird Hensley. She attended Covina High School, and graduated from Westminster Choir College, Princeton, New Jersey in 1968. She graduated in 2005 with a degree in music from Southwestern Assemblies of God University. Pamela_Baird ( born Pamela_Beaird on April_6_,_1945 ) is an_American_former_actress , best_known for her_role as "_Mary_Ellen_Rogers " , the_girlfriend of "_Wally_Cleaver " on the_classic_sitcom , Leave It to Beaver . She appeared in seven of the_show 's_235_episodes , but her_name was_mentioned in many_other_segments . Mary_Ellen and Wally eventually wed , as they were_shown as a_married_couple in the_1983_reunion_movie Still the_Beaver and the_subsequent_The_New Leave It to Beaver_series_( in which Janice_Kent played Mary_Ellen ) . Prior to_Leave It to Beaver , Baird appeared as Hildy_Broeberg in ten_episodes of the_CBS_western_series My_Friend_Flicka_(_1956 – 1957_) , starring Johnny_Washbrook , Gene_Evans , Anita_Louise , and Frank_Ferguson . Baird also appeared as one of Kelly 's_{_Noreen_Corcoran_}_friends on the_sitcom_Bachelor_Father . She is_now_married , has five_children , and is_legally_named Pamela_Beaird_Hensley . She attended Covina_High_School , and graduated from Westminster_Choir_College , Princeton , New_Jersey in 1968 . She graduated in 2005 with a_degree in music from Southwestern_Assemblies of God_University .
